short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CreataChain Wallet is a safe place to keep your cryptocurrency.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Creata Chain Wallet is a safe place to keep your cryptocurrency. The market is open 24/7. Your funds are safe and secure, and you have complete access at any time from anywhere.

With the Creata Chain Wallet, your assets are always in your control.

- Create and restore the wallet using 12 or 24 mnemonics.
- Back up your recovery phrase.
- Send and Receive coins.
- See your transaction history.


If you want to provide feedback, please send us an email at info@creatachain.io.

Powered by Creata Chain
